title: Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 X86 X64 ESD OEM en-US Mar 2015 by Generat
description:
[ RELEASE INFO ]


* File: Win7.X86X64.en-US.Mar2015.iso

* Sources:
* 32-bit: X17-59463 & dvd 677710
* 64-bit: X17-59465 & dvd 677651

* Size: 4,43GB
* Format: Bootable ISO

* CRC32: d39e535f
* MD5: 0f5be81019dfeca74f30f06ad68d03c2
* SHA-1: 99cdb6b7298777aa4ba4d8f81562fe11ced4ae4a

* Language: en-US [English - USA]

[ CONTENTS ]

* Integrated / Pre-installed in Audit Mode:

* .NET Framework 4.5.2 Hotfix Rollup (KB3022670)
* Internet Explorer 11
* Hotfixes - 2015-03-10

* Setupcomplete / Post-install:

* Defender Updates

[ FEATURES ]

* install.wim compressed to recovery format (install.esd)

[ EDITIONS INCLUDED ]

* 32bit:

* Windows 7 Professional
* Windows 7 Enterprise
* Windows 7 Ultimate
* Windows 7 Professional - - - -OEM-Activated
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - - -OEM-Activated
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - - - OEM-Activated

* 64bit:

* Windows 7 Professional
* Windows 7 Enterprise
* Windows 7 Ultimate
* Windows 7 Professional - - - -OEM-Activated
* Windows 7 Enterprise - - - - - OEM-Activated
* Windows 7 Ultimate - - - - - - OEM-Activated


* OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) will automatically activate

* (if HP, Asus, Toshiba, etc), and input manufacturers login screen,

* wallpaper, system properties logo and User Account logo.

* If you choose non-OEM (eg Custom Build) you can activate with

* Daz Loader or KMS in WPI screen at end of install.

* Testing has shown that if you choose OEM for Custom Build, wallpaper,etc still

* gets applied but will not automatically activate. In this instance use WPI.


[ COMMENTS & ACTIVATION INFO ]


* A WPI-window will pop up in the last phase of the installation.

* All optional applications except 7-Zip and WinRAR uses web installers

* that will install the latest available version for you.

* Web installers requires connection to internet.

* To activate Enterprise, select "Enterprise Only".

* For all other editions, select "Daz Loader".

* Choose any optional application(s).

* Click on "Begin Install" to execute your choices.

* To skip activation and optional applications, just click on "Exit".

* Activators:

* Daz Loader v2.2.2.0
* KMSpico v10.0.4 Portable Edition

[ Both Activators Potential False Positive Virus Alarm ]


[ Optional software ]

* Google Chrome
* Mozilla Firefox
* Opera Chromium
* 7-zip 9.30
* Adobe Reader
* DirectX
* Flashplayer
* Java JRE
* Malwarebytes
* MSE
* Notepad++
* WinRAR 5.21
* GOM Player
* VLC Player
* Winamp


[ INSTALLATION & INFORMATION ]

* A boot.wim from Win 8 is used to get Win7 to work with ESD format.
* This makes setup resembles the Win 8, but it is 100% Win7.


* Create bootable USB 2.0 (highly recommended) with Rufus,
* (attached) or burn to DVD at slow speed.


*Hope you will enjoy this release!

* Regards,
* Generation2 [/b]
